name: Skull Slayer (Dan Campbell)
description:
Skull Slayer is a Doom-inspired retro shooter where you must vanquish evil skulls to proceed to the next level. When ammo and health run low, make sure to scavenge the levels for pickups for that needed boost.

HOW TO PLAY
  • Use the WASD/ arrow keys to move
  • Use the mouse to look around and click the left mouse button to shoot
  • Whilst exploring, keep an eye out for enemies to kill and pickups to replenish your health and ammo. 
CREDITS
  • Made by Dan Campbell - Twitter 
  • Voiced by Daniel Thirlaway
  • Assets provided by gamesplusjames - YouTube
CREATOR MESSAGE

Skull Slayer is one of my first projects made with Unity and it has taught me some important lessons. Working with my friend Daniel to implement voice lines into the game was a fun but informative process and GamesPlusJames tutorial series gave me the insight and knowledge to tackle future projects. Thanks for playing!
